msContents.summary:
This manuscript is of Laghuśabdenduśekhara although the title in the Pasedach it is mentioned as śabdenduśekhara. The folio mostly worm eaten so many time difficult to follow the letters. The last folio has a list of subjects according to the sūtrapāṭha Aṣṭādhyāyī. Many folio worm eaten or broken in the left margin hence the folio numbers are lost. The bank folio after the first guard folio has written at the centre line 1 śekharaṃ line 2 śekharaṃ line 3 śekharaṃ 290. Initial blank folio has some verse written in Granth script. The edges of the folio are broken some times. Last folio has list written in three columns : In the left margin is written hariḥ oṃ column1- line 1 vṛddhīpādaḥ line 2 gāṅ[kuṭādipādaḥ ] line 3 bhuvādipādaḥ line 4 āka[ḍāra]pādaḥ line 5 samāsapādaḥ line 6 purvāparapādaḥ line 7 anabhihitapādaḥ line 8 [dvigu]pādaḥ line 9 [pra]tya[ya]pādaḥ line 10 karmaṇipādaḥ
2nd column - line 1 bahulapādaḥ line 2 saṃbandhapādaḥ line 3 ṅyāppādaḥ line 4 raktapādaḥ line 5 yuṣmakapādaḥ line 6 ḍhakpādaḥ line 7 dhānyapādaḥ line 8 śatapādaḥ line 9 ekācpādaḥ
3rd column line 1 bahuvrīhipādaḥ line 2 aṃgapādaḥ line 3 yuvopādaḥ line 4 sicipādaḥ line 5 devikāpādaḥ line 6 ṇaupādaḥ line 7 śarvasya dvepādaḥ

msItem.title: Laghuśabdenduśekhara
msItem.author: Nāgojībhaṭṭa
msItem.incipit: (1v 1) pātañjale mahābhāṣye kṛtabhuripariśramaḥ śivabhaṭṭasuto dhīmān satidevyāstu garbhajaḥ yāca (lacuna of a few letters).
msItem.explicit: (290r 11) yo nataraṃgasyaiva grahaṇaṃ iti pratiṣṭhitam dvitiyārtheneti cet kālādhvanori (lacuna of 2-3 letters) ṇa

support.p: Thick wooden brown guard folio. Back guard folio has flower design and the square border is carved.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 4 blank folio, 290 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Numbers are mostly lost but Tamil numerals are used to foliation.
supportDesc.condition: Broken in the left margin hence the folio numbers are lost. Overall the folio have wormholes.

handNote.desc: sharp shapes. style of writing l at the end is diffrent than usual granth characters.

decoNote.desc: Back guard folio has flower design and the square border is carved.

additions.desc: At the begging guard folio the number 13 is written in the left margin with pencil and number 34 is written in pink pencil after the first stringhole.

binding.p: The red woolen thread and also hemp is used to tie.

encodingDesc.p: Square brackets are used to show the illegibel letters. Number of letters due to broken or not redable due to wormhole is mentioned in the bracket.
